solver

Class BFSMazeSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • solver.BFSMazeSolver

  • public class BFSMazeSolver
extends java.lang.Object
    A Breadth First maze solving class, adapted for use with KivaWorld. Given a solver.Maze() object, solves the map from starting location to pod location to drop zone location, or from start to end if there is no pod in the map.

    This is a heavily modified version of com.baeldung.algorithms.maze.solver.BFSMazeSolver.

    See Also:
    Maze

      (package private) static int[][] DIRECTIONS
      2D Directions array (ordered coordinate integer pairs) [0] = UP, [1] = RIGHT [2] = DOWN [3] = LEFT Points are in reflected format [row][col] or (y,x).

      (package private) boolean hashMapTrial
